name: Dark Colosseum
description:
Explosive fun in the battle for ascension

You and your fellow demons vie for a spot in heaven. The catch? There's only one spot left.

This is a game made in under 72 hours during Ludum Dare 42. It was made by Mika Molenkamp (programming) and Jorrit Neslo (art).

Features
  • A Bomberman spin-off with a twist: each bomb takes away the floor with it. Your world is ever-shrinking!
  • Fast-paced action and fun for the whole family! (sort of)
  • Gather powerups to gain an edge over your opponents
  • High replayability thanks to random arena layouts and short playtime
  • AI opponents to test your mettle against (no local mp, sorry!)
How to Play

You always control Player 1 (red).

  • WASD or arrow keys for movement
  • Space to jump over small gaps
  • Left Shift or Left Control to drop a bomb.

Gamepad is also supported!
